short_summary: Commercial-Off-The-Shelf (COTS) software and services for a replacement Picture Archiving and Communications Software (PACS) solution
description: To obtain a COTS software for a replacement PACS solution. The PACS system must support at least 400 concurrent users and provide maintenance and support services for up to 7 years, as well as introductory training.
full_summary:
**Picture Archiving and Communication Software (PACS)**
==========================

### Tender Information

* **Tender Reference Number**: CB 488-15938843
* **Solicitation Number**: W6369-23-A090/A
* ** Publication Date**: 20 Oct 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: 29 Mar 2024, 14:00:00 EST
* **Tender Status**: Expired

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notices Type**: Request for Information
* **Notice Type Description**: This is a request for information to gather feedback on the requirements and preparation for a subsequent Request for Proposal (RFP).

### Requirements

In support of the Department of National Defence (DND), a commercial-off-the-shelf (COTS) Picture Archiving and Communication Software (PACS) solution is required. The selected solution should be able to support at least 400 concurrent users, including maintenance and support services for up to 7 years, and introductory training.

The PACS solution must serve as a primary tool for uncovering evidence from Diagnostic Images (DI), needed to make recommendations and draw conclusions for healthcare decision-making purposes within Canadian Forces Health Services (CFHS). Please review the attached documents for complete details.

### Request for Information

The purpose of this RFI is to solicit feedback on all aspects of the above-mentioned requirements to enable Canada to consider industry perspectives and to provide industry with reasonable planning lead time to prepare for any resultant RFP.

### Attachments

Please review the attached documents for complete details.

* [Annex A – Statement of Requirement] (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22780/w6369-23-a090_-_pacs_-_rfi_-_amd_3_-_english_0.pdf)
* [Draft Annex A – Statement of Requirement] (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22780/w6369-23-a090---pacs---rfi---english.pdf)

Note: This tender has expired, and no new submissions can be accepted.  



[post by program manager. Validation scheduled for:  031632 -  April 12, 2024. Priority level change candidates subject to LSD evaluation. Payment for supplies urgent, sterling by CH motivate].
